name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic cheese and tomato pizza with fresh basil.

description: Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

description: Grilled beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

description: Soft tacos with seasoned chicken, lettuce, and salsa.
